title: "Longevity Foundation to Fund Geroscience Research with €860M"
excerpt: "The newly-created Longevity Science Foundation aims to extend the human lifespan to more than 120 years by channeling over €860M ($1B) into early-stage geroscience research in the next decade. Experts say that’s a worthy if complex goal."
